title: Big Henry and the polka dot kid
creator_credit: Richard Marquand, Linda Gottlieb and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: Presents an adaptation of the novel ‘Luke Baldwin’s Vow’ by Morley Callaghan, about a ten year old orphan boy who goes to live with his aunt and uncle in rural Canada. Shows how the boy’s love for an old blind dog leads to conflict with his uncle who feels that the animal is impractical to keep.
